fields.title: Curonian Spit to Klaipeda
fields.post_content: Just conquered my debut trek along the Jurtaka trail from the Curonian Spit to Klaipeda! Covered around 15 kilometers, and the sand dunes were absolutely mind-blowing, though the hike itself was moderately challenging. Packed enough water and snacks to keep me going, and it's such a perfect weather.  A sunny day with a refreshing breeze made every step worth it. Can hardly contain my excitement for what tomorrow's adventure holds!

fields.title: Rainy day struggles
fields.post_content: Got caught in a downpour near Jurkalne. The mud and slips were relentless, and even though our gear held up, it was a really tough day. I'm starting to wonder if the weather conditions are ever going to improve. I'm not sure if I should keep hiking on. Any advice on dealing with this kind of weather? The coastal views were beautiful, but I'm finding it hard to stay positive right now.

fields.title: Pape Nature Park
fields.post_content: Just trekked through Pape Nature Park-covered about 20 kilometers in total. Super chill trail, mostly flat, difficulty level easy to moderate. And wow, the wildlife! Saw wild horses and tons of birds. Trail is in a great shape. Such a vibe! Later on the stretch took me through some serene forest paths and open meadows, making the entire hike even more enjoyable.

fields.title: Epic sunset at Jurkalne cliffs
fields.post_content: Ended a long hike with an epic sunset at Jurkalne cliffs. Some steep parts, but totally worth it. Cool weather, perfect for hiking. More days like this, please!

fields.title: Trail struggles between Pape Nature Park and Liepaja
fields.post_content: Just finished a challenging stretch of today! The views were absolutely breathtaking, but I have to admit, finding food and supplies along this remote stretch was a bit of a struggle. With few shops or restaurants in sight, I found myself running low on snacks and water faster than I anticipated. Lesson learned: always pack more provisions than you think you'll need, especially on more isolated trails like this one. For anyone planning to tackle this section my advice is to stock up on essentials beforehand and carry plenty of water and high-energy snacks to keep you fueled throughout the day. It's also a good idea to plan your route carefully and identify any potential rest stops or towns with amenities along the way.Despite the challenges, the natural beauty and solitude of this stretch of the trail made it all worth it. Just make sure you're prepared for the journey ahead!

fields.title: Heatwave hike near Riga
fields.post_content: Hiking near Riga in a surprise heatwave. So hot but stayed hydrated and took shade breaks. Coastal scenery kept me going. Never expected this kind of heat!

fields.title: Liepaja camping
fields.post_content: Camped by the sea near Liepaja last night. The waves were so soothing. Hike to get here was moderate with some rocky bits. Sunset over the sea was magical!
